page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER - GLOUCESTER
page.content: THE OVERCROWDED PRISON AT THE QUAYSIDE IS BEING ENLARGED AND HAS A HIGH MESH FENCE UNTIL A NEW STONE WALL IS BUILT. NEARBY IS A NEW CENTRAL POLICE STATION PART OF THE EXTENSION TO THE SHIRE HALL WHERE THE CROWN COURT SITS. MOST POLICE PATROLS ARE IN PANDA AND RESPONSE CARS EQUIPPED WITH RADIOS BUT FOOT PATROLS ARE COMING BACK INTO USE. MUGGING AND CAR THEFTS ARE MAIN CRIMES THE JUVENILE COURT IS ALSO NEAR THE PRISON AND THE CITY MAGISTRATES COURT IS ON THE BARBICAN SITE. THE SHIRE HALL IS ALSO USED BY THE COUNTY MAGISTRATES,H.M.CORONER IS AT 57,WESTGATE STREET. TODAY MORE OFFENDERS RECEIVE PROBATION AND REPORT REGULARLY TO THE OFFICE. A LARGE GEORGIAN HOUSE IN SPA ROAD IS THE JUDGES LODGINGS. TRAFFIC WARDENS PREVENT VEHICLES OBSTRUCTING STREETS BY PARKING FOR TOO LONG.
